response.original_title: To Right a Wrong: The Story of Ballard Mountain
response.overview: This thirteen-minute film documents a community campaign to change the name of a local peak in the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area. Previously known as a racial slur, the mountain was renamed in 2010 to honor the first Black family to homestead in the Santa Monica Mountains.
response.title: To Right a Wrong: The Story of Ballard Mountain
